```{r tworzenie listy gatunków literackich - jednorazowo(?)}
#wydobycie listy gatunków
gatunki_litX655 <- data.frame(X655 = UKD_lit$X655) %>%
  unique() %>%
  filter(!is.na(X655)) %>%
  mutate(X655 = str_replace_all(X655,"(^|\\|)","~\\1")) %>%
  cSplit(.,"X655",sep = "~",direction = "long") %>%
  filter(X655!="") %>%
  mutate(X655 = str_replace_all(X655,"(.*?)(\\$a.*)(\\$2.*)","\\2")) %>%
  unique() %>%
  mutate(pole = "X655") %>%
  dplyr::rename(gatunki = X655)

gatunki_litX650 <- data.frame(X650 = UKD_lit$X650) %>%
  unique() %>%
  filter(!is.na(X650)) %>%
  mutate(X650 = str_replace_all(X650,"(^|\\|)","~\\1")) %>%
  cSplit(.,"X650",sep = "~",direction = "long") %>%
  filter(X650!="") %>%
  mutate(X650 = str_replace_all(X650,"(.*?)(\\$a.*)(\\$2.*)","\\2")) %>%
  unique() %>%
  mutate(pole = "X650") %>%
  dplyr::rename(gatunki = X650)

gatunki_lit <- rbind(gatunki_litX655,gatunki_litX650) %>%
```

```{r generowanie listy zapisow z osobami PBL}
pbl_viaf <- sheets_read(ss = "1cEz73dGN2r2-TTc702yne9tKfH9PQ6UyAJ2zBSV6Jb0") %>%
  filter(czy_ten_sam!="nie") %>%
  select(pbl_id, BN_id, BN_name) %>%
  mutate(name = str_replace_all(BN_name,"\\|\\(", " ("),
         name = str_replace_all(BN_name, "\\;\\|", "; ")) %>%

#100
marc_field_100 <- bn_ks %>%
  select(id,X100)%>%
  filter(X100!="") %>%
  mutate(X100=str_replace_all(X100,"(^|\\|)","~\\1")) %>%
  cSplit(.,"X100",sep = "~",direction = "long") %>%
  filter(X100!="") %>%
  mutate(X100=str_remove_all(X100,"^\\|")) %>%
  mutate(indicator = str_replace_all(X100,"(^.*?)(\\$.*)","\\1"))
subfield_list<- str_extract_all(bn_ks$X100,"\\$.")
subfield_list<- unique(unlist(subfield_list))
empty_table<- data.frame(matrix(ncol = length(subfield_list),nrow = lengths(marc_field_100)[1]))
colnames(empty_table) <-subfield_list
marc_field_100<-cbind(marc_field_100,empty_table)
subfield_list_char <- paste("(",subfield_list,")",sep = "")
subfield_list_char <- str_replace_all(subfield_list_char,"\\$","\\\\$")

x <- 1:length(subfield_list)
for (i in x) {
  progress(match(i,x), max.value = length(x)) 
  marc_field_100$X100 <- str_replace(marc_field_100$X100,subfield_list_char[i],"|\\1")
}
for (i in x) {
  progress(match(i,x), max.value = length(x)) 
  subfield_list_char2 <- str_replace_all(subfield_list,"\\$","\\\\$")
  string_a <- "(^)(.*?\\|"
  string_b <- subfield_list_char2[i]
  string_c <- ")(.*?)(\\,{0,1})((\\|\\$)(.*)|$)"
  string <- paste(string_a,string_b,string_c,sep = "")
  marc_field_100[,i+3] <- ifelse(grepl(subfield_list_char2[i],marc_field_100$X100),str_replace_all(gsub(string,"\\3",marc_field_100$X100),"\\${2}.", "~"),NA)
}
```

```{r dalsze przygotowanie zbioru do importu}
#wczytanie wyselekcjonowanych gatunków literackich
gatunki_lit <- sheets_read(ss = "1WwQGithbldJoF1JeoJiuCsF6FECPPFFYOi8IMXuHee8", sheet = "gatunki_literackie") %>%
  filter(`czy_gat_literacki?`=="tak") %>%
  select(1,2) %>%
  unique()
gatunki_lit_1 <- gatunki_lit %>%
  filter(pole=="X655") %>%
  select(1)
gatunki_lit_2 <- gatunki_lit %>%
  filter(pole=="X650") %>%
  select(1)
#filtrowanie po UKD literackim
UKD_lit <- bn_ks %>%
  mutate(ukd_lit = grepl("\\$a8", X080)) %>%
  filter(ukd_lit == TRUE) %>%
  select(-ukd_lit)
#szukanie po wybranych gatunkach literackich
UKD_lita <- sqldf("select *
                          from UKD_lit a
                          join gatunki_lit_1 b on a.X655 like ('%'||b.gatunki||'%')") %>%
  select(-length(.)) %>%
  unique()
UKD_litb <- sqldf("select *
                          from UKD_lit a
                          join gatunki_lit_2 b on a.X650 like ('%'||b.gatunki||'%')") %>%
  select(-length(.)) %>%
  unique()
UKD_lit <- sqldf("select *
                      from UKD_lit a
                      where a.id in (select a.id from UKD_lita a)
                      or a.id in (select a.id from UKD_litb a)") %>%
  arrange(X655,X650)

#wybór ksiązek, które nie mają UKD literackiego, ale mają gatunek literacki
bez_UKD_lit <- sqldf("select *
               from bn_ks a
               where a.id not in 
               (select b.id
               from UKD_lit b)")

bez_UKD_lit_a <- sqldf("select *
                          from bez_UKD_lit a
                          join gatunki_lit_1 b on a.X655 like ('%'||b.gatunki||'%')")
bez_UKD_lit_b <- sqldf("select *
                          from bez_UKD_lit a
                          join gatunki_lit_2 b on a.X650 like ('%'||b.gatunki||'%')")

bez_UKD_lit <- sqldf("select *
                      from bez_UKD_lit a
                      where a.id in (select a.id from bez_UKD_lit_a a)
                      or a.id in (select a.id from bez_UKD_lit_b a)") %>%
  arrange(X655,X650)
UKD_lit <- UKD_lit %>%
  select(id) %>%
  mutate(gatunkowanie = "UKD_lit")
bez_UKD_lit <- bez_UKD_lit %>%
  select(id) %>%
  mutate(gatunkowanie = "gat_lit_bez_UKD_lit")

#szukanie po gatunkach teatr, film, radio, telewizja
```

```{r przypisanie redaktor?w do przedmiotowej}
options(scipen = 999)
przedmiotowe <- mutate(przedmiotowe,

}
```
